messages.message: human review frontend is lagging a bit w/ table/list of objects edit, does anyone know if something's changed? seems like a frontend issue

i'm not aware of any recent changes to the table editing UI in Human Review

did this not occur in previous release versions?
nope, this is the first time i'm seeing any kind of rendering weirdness on field edit
i wasn't able to reproduce it on my end - could you share the link/workspace?

oh I can reproduce it for that workspace. interesting, it seems like it's not consistent (https://aihub-uat.internal.instabase.com/api/v1/flow-correction/revalidate-records) across all the workspaces. The one thing I notice in yours is it's calling `/revalidate-records` after each table cell edit which seem to be triggering a reload on the component. Seems like a FE bug.

interesting! thanks for looking into it! @jaden

i think we should call `/revalidate-records` after the user exits the table editing UI? (ie they click the "x" at the top right)
